languageKey.label: Create Pages wizard
Enables you to create a batch of new, empty pages for quickly building up a new page tree. Just enter the titles for the pages you need. Only filled in fields will be created as pages.

The new pages will always be created as subpages to the currently active page from the page tree. This page is shown in the top of the page. In the example image below it is "/Intro/Startpage/". "Place new pages after the existing subpages" If you select this option the pages will be create after any existing subpages. "Hide new pages" Select this if the new pages should be hidden by default. This option may be forced upon you if you do not have credentials to create new, online pages. Lorem Ipsum...
